properties.name: Simian Akademy of Anthropomorphic Sciences
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 6:45 & Arcade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Come one, come all to Dr. Googol's Simian Akademy and marvel at the advances made in the Anthropomorphic Sciences -- the most astounding of natural philosophies! See the Octopus Pavilion! Marvel at the dexterity of trained monkeys as they demonstrate their industrious utility by repairing velocipedes of every sort and size! And lest we neglect the fairer sex, consult with our resident Mistress of Olfaction who will concoct a custom perfume for you right before your very eyes!
Events: Burdened with useless swag? How about something useful? Stop by the Olfactorium and have a custom perfume created just for you by professional perfumer, Agent 11. Scent evokes memories directly through the limbic system in a way no mere memento ever could. You will leave with a mini perfume that is tailored to your tastes—something you can take back to the default world as an everyday reminder of your experiences at Burning Man. Monday, Tuesday, and Wednesday from 11am-12 noon.
Monkey Wrench Station will attempt to help anyone with a bike, costume, or small mechanical malfunction. Spin the Wheel of Fortune to determine your fate. Will our team of trained monkeys fix your dolorous disaster or break it altogether? Only the hand of fate knows. Monday, Wednesday, and Friday from 9-10 am.

We will serve home made kombucha and champagne while bouncing on exercise balls to bubbly music inside the magnificent bouncy bar. We will also host bouncy ball exercise classes to teach our unique bouncy ball moves such as: egg-sac ant crawl, bouncy ball headstands and on ball meditation. properties.name: Black Rock Roller Disco
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 9
Address:
Location: 8:15 & Esplanade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Black Rock Roller Disco is Burning Man's roller skating rink. This will be our 15th year bringing our fun, exciting, inclusive world of roller skating from San Francisco's Golden Gate Park and the Church of 8 Wheels to the playa to spread "rolligion" to the burning world and we have a funky good time doing it. We're open 24/7 with yoga in the morning. The Black Rock Rollergirls take over on Thursday evening with a fantastic version of roller derby on the playa. We have over 100 pairs of skates, but it's best to have your own. Come be a party of it anytime!!!
Events: Every Morning - 8AM. - Yoga with BarbaraMac
Every Afternoon @ 1PM - Learn to Skate with the GodFather
Thursday @6PM - Ass kickin' Roller Derby - Playa Style!!!
Special guest DJ's playing and spinning throughout the week

https://youtube.com/watch?v=L32CNfJUfMQ

properties.Description: The Black Rock Roller Disco is Burning Man's roller skating rink. This will be our 15th year bringing our fun, exciting, inclusive world of roller skating from San Francisco's Golden Gate Park and the Church of 8 Wheels to the playa to spread "rolligion" to the burning world and we have a funky good time doing it. We're open 24/7 with yoga in the morning. The Black Rock Rollergirls take over on Thursday evening with a fantastic version of roller derby on the playa. We have over 100 pairs of skates, but it's best to have your own. Come be a party of it anytime!!!

properties.name: It's All Made Up (IAMU)
properties.description:
Village: Home Rule Village
Sector: 4.5
Address: 4:45 & Donniker, Black Rock City
Location: 4:45 & Donniker, Black Rock City
Description: It’s All Made Up (IAMU) is a Burning Man camp and collaborative community that exists to create. Once you do something, it’s hard to believe that you can’t. So we create experiences, tools, services, connections and opportunities that help each of us get the transformations we are up to. That can be anything. For fun.
On Playa we live in Home Rule Village, along with our sister camps: Pedal Pies, Gold Star, Third Space Place, Iguana Chill Camp and Flamin’ Java. We organize the DC Containers and our charter Burner Express bus. We also aim to design and build an amazing camp that lets anyone be the best you that you are. Maybe that means authenticity, improv, forgiveness, dancing, art, spinning or a rooftop bar.
Back in DC, NYC, LA, SF and further flung places, we connect Burners and all manner of creators who are up to making their lives, cities, projects and ventures better, more real. For fun. Quality trouble. Because we can. We all can.
Events:
Link: http://www.itsallmadeup.org/

Description: Each day our camp hosts a snow cone cocktail party during the late afternoon. These cocktail parties are a great way to meet other Burners.
For 9 years SKS has provided solar power for artist project, camps, villages, and individual Burners. Will Korthof was our solar guru, expert and advocate.
Will sadly passed away in October of 2014 and our solar work in the future remain undefined as of right now.

properties.name: Canadian Cascadian Tiki Lounge
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 3
Address:
Location: 2:45 & Ballyhoo, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Canadian Cascadian Tiki Lounge will feature craft beers from the Cascadian range on the west coast of North America. Starting in the western Canadian province of British Columbia and stretching south through Washington to Oregon, the Cascadian range is home to a wide variety of successful craft breweries which produce beers that can be found world wide. Known for their custom of innovation and creativity, craft breweries are small, independent operations which endeavor to think outside the box of traditional beer marketing to create memorable and delicious beers.The Canadian Cascadian Tiki Lounge's mission is to bring and share the fruits of these labors to the dusty, arid playa, quenching the thirst of curious burners who wish to know more about this tasty tradition by offering tastings of specific types of beers daily. Our Ciceron-in-training, Nicole, will share her knowledge of the methods used to craft these beers, the types of foods best paired with them as well their history from their inception in wooden casks in the UK to the modern day beverage enjoyed everywhere today.Burners will be encouraged to sample each beer as they are discussed and participate in a Q&A about the style of each beer as well as the various hops and the flavors they bring to each brew. Our hope is that by exposing more people to quality craft beers that we can begin to change their views on the beverage and encourage them to move out of the flavorless rut that is big brewery domestic beer.
Events: Tastings Tues, Thursday, Friday from 3-5pm  Beats nightly!
Link:

Description: The goals of Chakralicious Camp are to offer a variety of workshops, presentations, bands, and DJs, and take people on a rite of passage through the 7 chakras. Our philosophy is that the chakras are the seven centres of spiritual energy in the human body, and when all of the chakras are aligned, we can experience full power and transcendence as a whole community. With our decor, classes, altars and educational offerings, we wish to give people an opportunity to go on a “chakra tour” and dive deeper into their own creative potential.

properties.name: Ignited States Ski Patrol
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 4.5
Address:
Location: 4:45 & Carny, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Dare to enter the Ignite Your State Ski Lodge for a ski shot, and spin the Wheel of Drinkers Fortune. Whiskey or water or something in between, only the Wheel of Drinkers Fortune knows. Hang out in the shade of the dome and play cards or board games, take your insults from the Bearded Lady (if she's awake), and then take a few short steps to the Ski Patrol Fun n Games Tent or the Front Porch.

At the Ski Patrol Fun n Games Tent, players will * Try to win at Scrotisserie - our version of ring toss                                                                              * Play Boob Darts                                                    * Have their fortune told                                        * Take their chances in the kissing booth          * Match wits against others in the Super Fight Card Game                                                                * Hit - or miss - a target playing Ski Pole Archery                                                                         * And yes, there's more
Had enough? Relax in the shade on our Front Porch, get spritzed with one of our special misters, and hang out with the Ski Patrollers for a while.
Events: Open daily at various times between noon and dusk
It wouldn't be Ignited States without our annual birthday party! Everyone who has a birthday in 2015 is invited to celebrate with Birthday Girl on Saturday at 4:00! Birthday Girl has an extra special birthday this year, and the best rendition of ""When I'm 64"" will win a very special prize!

properties.name: Spirit Dream
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 4.5
Address:
Location: 5:15 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: 12 means established. 12 years of coming home to the playa. 12 years of spirit interaction, mothering, fathering, blessing, elevating, sowing, reaping, laughing, and sharing. Spirit Dream is our home, where our heart is and we hope you will join us. Stop by and we'll fill your water, stay a bit and enjoy our expresso, a while longer and you will start to transform. Feel the strength bubbling up from the land and the refreshing rain falling from above. We will look to see your original design and embrace it with you. We will speak life to that which was lost and bring healing to that which was broken. We come to the playa to see you, to meet you, to embrace you, and to release you into something far greater. Come and let us serve you and your purpose on the Earth. We can't wait to see you...

Village: Black Rock French Quarter
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 7:45 & Esplanade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Producers of the first and only wine grown pressed and aged entirely in Black Rock City! Established in 1999 the vineyards have nurtured a cutting of the nearly extinct carnivorous Cabernet Dionaea for 12 years to yield the acclaimed Vinum Pejorative - vintners and wine lovers stop by for a sip! We especially need experts and trainees to start our first batch of Dandelion and Lilac wines!

Link: http://www.blackrockvineyards.org

If you have a special bottle in need of tender loving care we invite you to check your bottle into our refrigerated subterranean facility where it will await your return under lock and key. And while you're here why not join us for a tasting? And if you have construction skills our excavation crew always needs hand.

properties.name: Camp Mystic
properties.description:
Village: Honeysuckle Hood Village
Sector: 2
Address:
Location: 2:00 & Geek, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Camp Mystic is a highly interactive theme camp with a 15+ year history at burning man. We showcase visionary art installations, music and performance, and a day time series of evolutionary speakers and workshops.          VISIONARY ART: One of the things Camp Mystic has become most proud of is our showcase of incredible visionary art and performance from artists like Android Jones, Joma Sipes, Phadroid, Susan Boulet, Michael Divine, Hans Walor, Damien Jones, along with many more.MUSIC & DANCE: Camp Mystic brings together acoustic and live musical performances with some of burning man’s best artists on our famous Wednesday night party including Phutureprimitive, Random Rab, Human Experience, Desert Dwellers, Dixon's Violin, Alia, Nimitae, Kryston Pixston, and many others.                                                                       WORKSHOPS & SPEAKERS: The Mystics attract well known thought leaders, authors, speakers and teachers who offer their wisdom to the playa on topics ranging from human development, sexuality, relationship, post modern spirituality, the burning man ethos, feminine leadership, regenerative societies, emerging civilization and more.
Events: Exploring the New Story of Humanity's Evolution Speaker & Workshop Series: 1:00pm - 7:00pm Tuesday - Friday in both the Main Mystic Theater and our Healing Dome.
Link: http://www.campmystic.org

properties.name: VICE - Vietnamese Iced Coffee Experience
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 7:45 & Freak Show, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Vietnamese Iced Coffee Experience returns for its 15th! year of serving refreshing, hand-brewed, individually French-dripped, sweetened Vietnamese Iced Coffee to the caffeine-starved participants of Black Rock City.   We'll have a 20’x24’ lounge/café space and 20’x12’ coffee service structure. 
Events: We will serve VIC from 2pm to 4+pm (always a welcome respite from the early afternoon sun/dust) as well as a spontaneous service or two during the week that can happen at any time. There are interactive games to enjoy while waiting for coffee. We have additional scheduled activities including a return of our very popular Beard Spa and a night-time flagging (silk poi) workshop under black lights. Pearler beading and stilt walking are returning this year. Other possibilities are still being considered as our creative camp participants finalize plans for 2015. 
Link: https://www.facebook.com/groups/11110756

properties.name: Mystic Midway
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 4.5
Address:
Location: 5:15 & Carny, Black Rock City, NV
Description: MYSTIC MIDWAY is a community of artists, technologists, game designers, performers and cultural visionaries dedicated to creating deeply engaging, entertaining and meaningful social spaces.
This year, we bring the MYSTICAL MIDWAY, Carnival of Mythic Possibility to Burning Man's Carnival of Mirrors Midway at the base of the Man (3:00 side).
Inspired by an abundance of community spirit and social artistry he first witnessed at Burning Man in 1996, project director Scott Levkoff (aka The Professor) set out on a 20-year mission to study what made these marvelous social experiences possible.
The Mystical Midway is the latest and most ambitious incarnation of the Professor's ongoing mission.
By appearing at Burning Man this year, the Professor's ensemble invites the very community that was a major source of its inspiration to join us in stepping onto the Mythic Stage of Carnival of Mirrors and together, create wildly playful, deeply meaningful and truly unforgettable experiences.
Events: Tea party at 6PM each evening, all are welcome!Take a look at the cosplay guide on our web site for costume ideas if you are so inclined!
Link: http://www.mysticmidway.com/





https://youtube.com/watch?v=c6W5WO7isek

properties.name: Miso Horny
properties.description:
Village: Sparkle Donkey Village
Sector: 9
Address:
Location: 9:00 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Miso Horny is all about refining ourselves and each other. We value humor communication, playfulness, open mindedness, and creating strong meaningful bonds between one another. On the Playa we gift hot miso soup, sake, and herbal aphrodisiacs, as well as engaging conversations with our guests. There are camps at Burning Man that offer public spaces for sexual play and exploration. While we fully support those groups we choose to instead explore sex positivism by creating a safe event space for healthy dialogue of human sexuality. Our mission is to share ideas and philosophies that aid in the discovery of our sexual selves. We have created, and are always improving, a dedicated workshop and event space that is a platform for our lifelong journey of learning.
Events:
Link: http://misohorny.us

Description: Raised By Wolves is a transcontinental pack of artists, healers, performers, and builders who are inspired and impassioned by the classic story of feral children and their wolf pack families. Each year we bring our untamed energy to the Black Rock desert through play, performance and art. Our gifts this year include our Cafe, where you can get hot locally-roasted coffee every morning, and Ziza the Roving Tea Truck. We will also be hosting a speaker series each day, with a lecture followed by a more interactive workshop.

Description: We are a 12-step community who co-create a clean and sober environment for like-minded burners to have a safe place to camp. There are meetings from many different fellowships, from sunrise to midnight, and chips to mark years and/or burns. There are nightly excursions to check out the city and/or dance all night. We are not a glum lot.

And of course, all our staff is certified in CPR (Cocktail Party Resuscitation). But wait, that's not all !!! ICU offers a 200% money back guarantee ! Are you a certified Moctor or Curse? properties.name: Spanky's Wine Bar
properties.description:
Village: Spanky's Village
Sector: 3
Address:
Location: 3:55 & Carny, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Spanky's is the infamous crown-jewel of Burning Man bars. We are an interactive group of theme camps focused around our Wine Bar. This year, we are home to The Camp for Sensual Pleasures, Illumelodie and their Eros Tangeré Erotic Sensation Performance , Camp Stupid, Hello Camp, Mischievous Ambitions, The Buffer Zone, Body Painting, Camp Lola and so much more, along with a portion of The Burning Band. And new this year... Spanky's Carnival Midway! Spanky's is also the host of myriad events and activities, including (but not limited to); classes and demonstrations, MPR (Morning Painjoy Radio), many great DJs, The LBD (little black dress parade), The Festival of Bubastis, Spank-dat-Bootie, and The Post-Temple Wine-Down Party. Spanky's is also home to an amazing array of toys, such as the Spank-o-Matic machine, the Latex Vac-u-Bed, the Orgasamator and other adult-themed toys.! And on the air, Radio Free Spanky’s – 100.5 FM.
Events: Click here: :http://playaevents.burningman.org/playa_event/search/2015/?search=%22Spanky%27s+Wine+Bar%22
Link: http://www.spankyswinebar.com

properties.name: Hanging Gardens
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 6:45 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Hanging Gardens is an all-inclusive space - male, female, gay and straight - that celebrates the beauty of our interconnectedness through our three pillars of EDUCATION, RESTORATION and GROWTH. Visiting The Hanging Gardens means opening yourself up to the possibilities of chance meetings and unexpected playa adventures. HG will create a lush garden in the desert, complete with hammocks, plant life, cool shade, trees, vines and more, The Garden will host weary wanderers from all corners of the Playa with opportunities to learn together, heal together and foster growth both as individuals and as group. Come, relax and make a new friend, meet a family member you never knew you had or find the love of your life. The possibilities are endless; the connections, limitless.
Events: The 1st Annual BRC Gateway Garden Party! Join the Hanging Gardens for it's first ever Gateway Garden Party! First time on the playa? Seasoned Burner looking for an adventure with a new friend? The Gardeners are excited to invite you to our desert oasis to meet your neighbors and play our mysterious adventure game! We want to be your gateway to the playa! So come, hang out in the Garden, pair up with a stranger and find out what random adventure awaits! (Examples: "Have a lovely romantic walk along the esplanade until you find free food" or "Save the Man from the invading Aliens by neutralizing anyone wearing neon … here's your pew pew gun!”). Music, drinks and general revelry to ensue!Tuesday, September 1st, 2015 7 p.m. – 9 p.m.
Fly! Bring a friend to our garden, or come make a new one in this acro yoga playshop. To fly and be flown is a gift unlike any other, and a joyful opportunity to connect ever deeper with yourself and others. We will explore several basic mounts for the beginning flyer, and a few intermediate positions for those eager to take major lift-off. Yoga warm up, thai massage, and live music will be a feature of this class. No experience necessary. Bring a mat and a smile :) - Taught by Yoga Instructor Rocky Heron Wednesday, September 2nd, 2015 noon – 1:30 p.m.
Just Breathe! Come to the Hanging Gardens for a magical breathing circle and guided meditation by our camp Shaman. This will be a fun, heart-opening experience set to music that will facilitate much joy, laughter and rejuvenation. No meditation experience needed. Powerful natural high guaranteed! - Taught by Energy Therapist Joshua Farahnik Thursday, September 3rd, 2015 1 p.m. – 2:30 p.m.
Playacology Come join our camp scientist as he leads a fascinating discussion on the evolution, history and geology of the playa. Afterwards, we will go on a late night walk to observe some stars for a mini astronomy lesson. - Taught by Scientist James Dowd Thursday, September 3rd, 2015 9 p.m. – 11 p.m.
Decompression Detox Come to the gardens and join our Shaman for an informative one-hour lecture on how to restore and heal the body naturally using herbs and supplements. After this incredible week of extremes, you can use these tools to adapt back into the default world, lessen decompression time, and keep your physical and emotional bodies operating at their fullest. Or if you're struggling and need a second wind to get through this last weekend, learn some tips and try some herbal remedies that will give you new life! - Taught by Clinical Herbalist Joshua Farahnik Friday, September 4th, 2015 3 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Nourish! Come to our garden and water your seeds of ease and well-being through this yoga practice of restorative postures, pranayama (breath work) and mediation. Live acoustic music and mantra will accompany this deeply rejuvenating session designed to replenish your energy and soak your roots. Take time to care for yourself in the garden, that you may have even more to share and offer to this magical city we call home. Bring a mat and towel (if you have them). - Taught by Yoga Instructor Rocky Heron Friday, September 4th, 2015 4 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Link: http://www.facebook.com/hanginggardensbrc

HG will create a lush garden in the desert, complete with hammocks, plant life, cool shade, trees, vines and more, The Garden will host weary wanderers from all corners of the Playa with opportunities to learn together, heal together and foster growth both as individuals and as group. properties.name: NuTz Camp
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 10
Address:
Location: 10:00 & Hanky Pank, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Nutz family is dedicated to sharing love and joy and positive vibes with all that cross our path. We call up on the healing powers of music, namely break beats and house, to further our efforts to open hearts, create joy, form meaningful friendships and promote peace within our immediate community and the world beyond. Over the ten years of its existence, the Nutz Camp is proud to have become known as a safe-haven for fun, silliness and acceptance in our community.   
Come feel the Nutz Love at one of our legendary sunrise parties. Located at 10:00 & H we offer unobstructed views of the sunrise, happy vibes and some of the most beautiful sunrise sets to ever grace the playa!
Events: SUNRISE PARTIES
WEDNESDAY- FRIENDS OF NUTZTHURSDAY- KRAMER (DISTRIKT)FRIDAY- ANNUAL SHACK SUNRISE SET!

properties.name: Academy of Arts & Sciences
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 4.5
Address:
Location: 4:15 & Carny, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Our camp is focused on the intersection of Art and Science. We have an eclectic group, with some hardcore science types with awesome art instincts (like a real live aerospace engineer that does body painting) and some amazing art types that love science. This year, we will have interactive classes teaching burners about science that can be used to create art, as well as art that makes science real. We strive to balance the left/right brain dichotomy with a range of activities to meet our fellow Burners’ diverse tastes.We will be providing a wide range of activities on the playa. This year we are able to add night time activities in addition to our day time events. Some activities include:· Bismuth crystal making · Triple pendulums, separate Night and Day versions! See the prototype here! http://www.flickr.com/photos/mrscience/8654430636 · Harmonograph · Measurement of the earth’s procession · GPS trackering – wondering where you were last night? · Pneumatic can crusher- hours of fun creating ammo · Tasty beverage density columns · A veritable crap-ton of optical gadgets and more! We will have a complete listing in Who/What/Where plus a reader board in camp with details of the subjects and times. The list above are the activities we already have planned and built (where building is required). In addition to our daily activities, we generally strive to have a few impromptu events, such as last year’s Bacon and Socks on Thursday morning. Frankly, we were surprised how many people on the playa needed socks, and it was yet another opportunity to meet new people.The Bad Idea Bar will continue to operate throughout the week providing refreshing beverages upon request. Give us a bad idea and we’ll give you a bad drink. Bad ideas are listed and derogatory comments made throughout the week. At the end we have the community choose the best of the worst ideas, then celebrate the winners and losers with more bad drinks. The bar is always op en when we are around and you are of age.Feeling up for a view? Come inspect the playa and the friendliest neighborhood at Black Rock from our viewing platform. We are happy to share our view as it gives us a chance to learn a little more about you. Finally, and most important during the day, you want shade? We’ve got shade. Over 800 square feet of cool goodness with comfy seating and a filled ice jug are always available. Sit down and relax, get to know us a little better (and vice versa) and decide if you’d like to learn a bit more about the intersection of science and art.

properties.name: The Phage
properties.description:
Village: The Institute Village
Sector: 4.5
Address:
Location: 5:15 & Esplanade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Phage is an homage to the vast dark ecology whose foment gave birth to Earth's living diversity. These ubiquitous viral life forms evolve faster than any other life on earth. In their furious co-optive radiations, they have acted as the vital genetic pollinators that wove long-separated lines of cellular life into resplendent new threads - the phage are the needles of life's tapestry. Beware if you encounter us: memetic biohazards lie ahead.
Events:
Link: http://thephage.org/

properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 6:45 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Don’t be a Boar all by yourself, come play with the Pigmalions! We’ve been hosting our famous daytime party on the Playa for well over a decade. Our fabulous bartenders hog-craft each and every Bloody Mary we make with over 10 different ingredients. Sizzling strips of pork are hoof-served to the squealing swine wallowing on our shaded sofas. All vegetarians are welcomed (to be converted) at our event. Get your trotters tapping with DJ Julio playing some of the best (and obscure) disco you’ll ever hear. It kicks off around 11-ish in the morning. Just bring a cup and a smile. It’ll be sooey-eet.
Events: Saturday, Monday, Wednesday, and Friday: 11 AM-ish to 1 PM-ish

properties.name: Astropups
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 6:45 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Since 2001, the Astropups have been known for providing a cool (and furry) oasis on the playa where countless queer (and just queer-friendly) Burners have crossed paths and met new friends. The Astropups camp has always been hub of daytime and nighttime activity, whether it's one of our many queer proms, scavenger hunts, wrestling tournaments, cocktail mixers, tantric workshops, project runway-type competitions or crafternoons. 
Aside from our activities, the Astropups have been known for taking in wayward strays on a hot afternoon, either in a lively conversation in our public living room, or crashing in a restful snooze in our fun-fur lined playpen/chill space.
The Astropups camp has traditionally acted as a "front-porch" camp for the 'Gayborhood'. 'Gayborhood' camps regularly schedule joint activities to celebrate our joy on the playa.
Events:
Link: http://www.astropups.com/

Sector: 4.5

Description: Kidsville is THE place for kids and their families! We host a group of diverse families creating a unique space for play and other activities including the Black Rock Scouts program. Families with children 0-17 years of age are welcome to camp with us if they are pre-registered. Registration begins in March and ends when full. Note: Kidsville is NOT a baby-sitting service. All children must be supervised by an adult.

properties.Description: Kidsville is THE place for kids and their families! All children must be supervised by an adult.

properties.name: Millionaire Camp
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 3
Address:
Location: 3:45 & Esplanade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Burning Man desert - a dry, arid place bereft of technology, culture, and clothing. We've been coming to burning man for many years seeking new business connections, new investment opportunities, and sophisticated relaxation with others of our social class.

Millionaire Camp is a camp dedicated to meeting founders for monetary benefit, targeted promotional advertising, and bringing creature comforts for our esteemed guests without the hassle of having to organize them yourself.

For the past several years, we've operated from K street, and are thrilled that the Burning Man Org has recognized our significant contributions to the event, and placed on Esplanade and 3:45 this year!

In exchange for this honor, we've decided to allow more public access to our camp than in years prior. Instead of surrounding the camp with RVs, we've decided to scale back security to wristband access which can be obtained at the event upon approval of your millionaire status. Additionally, we are hosting 2 public events this year where anyone is welcome regardless of social status - our Cristal Happy Hour, and ShART Tank (though a small cover charge will be assessed). Ample Segway parking will be available out front, and any servants, companions, or assistants can spend their time with the rest of the interesting Illumination Village artists while you engage in your business.

Unfortunately, we are sold out of camping positions this year. Please ask to get on our list for application to the camp next year, and secure your early bird dues rate of $17,000. However, we are still looking for a few people interested in running the mechanics of the camp in exchange for a discounted rate for wristband access. Please enquire if interested.

We look forward to meeting you there at some point during the week!
Events:
Link: https://www.facebook.com/groups/millionairecamp

Address:
Location: 8:00 & Ersatz, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The BC Village is the amalgamation of four separate camps hailing from British Columbia: Space Jam; The Troll Bridge; The Peanut Gallery; and The Return of the Daisy. All British Columbia based all dedicated to bringing our unique blend of fun function and fundamental respect for our fellow burners and planet to Burning Man 2015. In addition to being polite, Canadian burners are known for their hospitality, generosity of spirit, and livers of steel. Come by and help us put the BC back in BRC!

properties.name: BRC Museum of Science Industry and Technology
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 9
Address:
Location: 9:15 & Carny, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The BRC Museum of Industry, Science and Technology (MoIST) pays tribute to both the real and fake people behind all the amazing inventions that make BRC and Burning Man possible. In addition to a traveling exhibition of the BRC Museum of Transportation History (which you may remember from Burning Mans 2013 and 2014), MoIST tells the stories of the brilliant, enterprising, or just plain lucky folks who brought us things like the hydration pack, rebar, the porta-potty, EL wire, the zip tie, and so many more. And don't miss the museum's bar: the MoIST-Tang Ranch. At the bar will be served... moist Tang. Patrons may decide how moist they want their Tang.
Events:
Link:

Description: Covered in Bees Offers a bee-themed Hive Lounge and Bar featuring home-brewed honey beers and whiskey infusions. Our incredible 1500 LED lighting covers our dome in an interactive fashion utilizing Microsoft Connect allowing visitors to manipulate the mood and patterns. Out front is our returning fire spinning space & burn barrel for fire comfort! The chill / lounge space includes a hookah bar. We support and promote bee awareness helping educate the public to the plight of colony collapse and similar issues while promoting bee keeping legislation. Our camp also hosts the Bombus Regius art car (pending DMV approval !)

properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 3
Address:
Location: 3:00 & Kook, Black Rock City, NV
Description: dEOxidized Camp is dedicated to recharging the batteries of all hard working burners. The camp is comprised of members of an Entrepreneurs Organization along with guests from all over the world. Together we will co-create an unforgettable experience with our community of friends, old and new. Our main attraction will be a 50' parachute featuring a lounge-type chill space with an open bar, live music, and happy hour everyday from 3 to Sunset. There will also be a stage for impromptu performance, educational talks, and well planned workshops throughout the day: ie, Yoga, bicycle workshops. We have members from all over the United States and as far as Dubai, New Zealand, and Mexico. We are a diverse group of burners with much to share and look forward to meeting you!
Events:
Link: http://www.deoxidized.org

Description: Gymnasium: We want to recreate the atmosphere of gymnasium in its original Ancient Greek meaning as a facility for training and competitions in public games as well a place for socializing and engaging in intellectual pursuits. The term originates from the word [gymnós] meaning "naked" because historically one exercised naked and we would like to revive this aspect too as we think that by doing athletic and fun activities naked, participants will experience bonding aspect of such events stronger and will only feel more comfortable and confident in their own skin.

Link: http://activenaturists.net/burning-man-2015/

properties.Description: Get twisted at camp Pink Fuzzy Monkey with one of the funnest themed twister boards on the Playa, sunset DJ sessions, and crazy fun parties. And if you really wanna get charged up, stop in at our Banana Bunch phone charging stations and plug yourself in!

properties.name: Playa Glass
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 6:30 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Ever wonder what's in playa dust? The special formula is just right for some solar glass making. Grab a pair of our welding goggles and we'll set you up at a Fresnel lens station where you'll raise the temperature of the dust to over 1000F and melt it in to black glass. Turn it in to a wearable pendant at the craft table and you'll have an easier-than-a-bag-of-dust way to take the playa back to the default world.
Events:
Link: http://capeandislands.org/post/breaking-down-dust

properties.name: Camp Soft Landing
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 9
Address:
Location: 9:15 & Carny, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Camp Soft Landing offers a comfortable space to drink tea, hydrate, rest, tell stories, and participate in workshops. Soft Landing sponsors and staffs the Full Circle Tea House, which is planning to return to the playa for the 5th year to offer fine pu'erh tea and herbal infusions in the Chinese Gung Fu tradition. Servers provide tea and empathy, and comfortable spaces for rest, hydration, and quiet conversation 24 hours a day. The Full Circle Tea House will be hosting a satellite Zendo in our camp this year. The Zendo project is coordinated by volunteers organized and trained by the Multidisciplinary Association for Psychedelic Studies (MAPS). Soft Landing also presents the Palenque Norte speaker series featuring 40 visionary talks and stories spanning concepts such as technology, medicine, art, science, design, and entheobotany. These events take place in the Palenque Norte circus tent which also hosts small musical performances and yoga.
Events:
Link: http://www.campsoftlanding.com

Be transported to our cozy forest where our talented Camp Counselors are here to provide fun activities like: the Ring Toss Drinking Game, 8-Bit scavenger hunt adventure, climbing up our two story Thirst Aid Tree House Bar, dream interpretation, painting on our art wall, playing spin the giant bottle, yoga, meditation, improv jam, poetry, performing in our annual Talent Show, dancing the night away at our Sexy Fancy Dancy Party, making out with that special camper, campfire stories, giant marshmallow S'Mores, or if you just want to chill, we have hammocks, hand misters, a comfy couch and a pillow tent, all for you to have the best Summer Camp of your life!

properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 4.5
Address:
Location: 4:45 & Hanky Pank, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The GREEN GODDESS invites Burning Man Participants of All Ages to join us for refreshments and reflection while nourishing your body with delightful tastes of fermented foods and beverages. Stop by for "Healthy Hour" from 2pm-5pm on Tuesday and Thursday to enjoy healthy homemade fermented refreshments while relaxing in our lounge space listening to soothing mantras and classical-infused electronic vibes, staying cool under the solar-powered water misters. Join us the Green Goddess on Monday and Wednesday morning (10:30am to Noon) for the "Fermented Goodness" workshop and learn about the benefits of probiotic foods including how to make them for yourself at home! All interested class participants will be gifted a kombucha or water kefir "starter kit" to use at home.

properties.description:

Sector: 7.5
Address:

Description: The New Barbarians and their band of human-sized dinosaurs are led by their massive Tyrannosaurus-like steel ruler, Jurassic Pork, on its quest to spread its bountiful stock of barbecued flesh taken from pastured hogs. The only hope for the few remaining survivors living amongst the playa is to join a never-ending feast suitable for King Horik himself as we share amongst the generosity of our humble leader JP and amalgamate ever closer to becoming one.

properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 4.5
Address:
Location: 4:15 & Ersatz, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Secret Gentlemen's Club will bring culture and refinement to this savage land. The Secret Gentlemen's Club is a space in which a person, be they commoner or king, can be the best version of themselves. The Secret Gentlemen's Club could use a stiff drink and knows how to mix it.well. The Secret Gentlemen's Club practices expert gamesmanship. The Secret Gentlemen's Club counts among its members both men and women (because of course women can be the most secret gentlemen of all). The Secret Gentlemen's Club reminds you that proper attire is required (or will be provided). The Secret Gentlemen's Club: Just Fucking Dandy

Sector: 6
Address:
Location: 6:15 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Tulle Forest for all and TuTus for anyone who wants one! Do not let your TuTu Tuesdays go unskirted; or your Tulle-Thuredays go untulled. Come to TuTu camp on Tuesday and Tullesday and indulge your clothing-making passion. Frolic in our Tulle-rest any time; enjoy its gauzy breeze and improvised trees.
Events: 2-3PM TuTu-esday: Do you need a guide in your TuTu making? Join us for a more orchestrated event.
2-3PM Thulle-sday: Skirts are hardly the limit -- they are just the bottom. More organized thulle-lery today. Multicolor!

We're pulling it out of the Lovin' Oven and dishing it up directly to you, every day from Tuesday-Sunday (10am-1pm). Let the smell of our TUSCAN FLATBREAD, sweet sumptuous jams, and mint tea draw you into our vibrant oasis. properties.description:

Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 8:00 & Ersatz, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Steam Bath Project makes the mundane magical! The simple act of "cleansing" becomes part of an age-old ritual tradition embracing the possibility of transformation. We invite you into the geodesic dome where you can relax on the wooden benches as boiling water produces steam with negative ions that fill the space. Negative ions are known to create an overall feeling of wellness similar to the air after a summer thunderstorm.

Link: https://www.facebook.com/SteamBathProject

properties.name: School of Safe Sex
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 3
Address:
Location: 3:30 & Ballyhoo, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The School of Safe Sex provides an inviting, casual, relaxing, judgment free, environment for guests from all corners of the globe and all walks of life to come together for an amazing burn. This is our way to unite the community through a positive and educational experience involving love and sensuality regardless of gender or sexual preferences.
We will have 800 square feet of shaded space for rest and relaxation in addition to a school yard with activities for our fellow burners to utilize 24/7.
We will offer interactive classes in the shaded school space where our fellow burners can discuss various sexual topics, ideas and fantasies. Though a class instructor will be provided each day, we can all learn from one another so class participation is strongly encouraged. We look forward to teaching, learning, loving, valuing and believing in others and ourselves all while having a sexy good time! We encourage everyone to arrive on time so that the classes can begin on schedule. It will also allow all those that wish to attend the opportunity to get a class snack and be entered for the chance to spin the prize wheel; there will be 15 prizes given out daily. The prizes will be an assortment of quality sex toys and hygiene kits.
We will have condom dispensers at the school and on the school buses where fellow burners can take condoms as needed throughout the week. This is our way to help Black Rock City stay safe and sex positive.
We will have two 1920's style mutoscopes at the school and two at center camp. These mutoscopes will have a variety of tasteful yet sultry and fun adult movies. The movies will be changed daily so we encourage everyone to stop by and checkout the new flicks of the day.
Events: 1 PM daily class on sexually related topics. 24 hour relaxing atmosphere, games, playground equipment. Each class participant will receive a handmade, numbered, School of Safe Sex necklace and a class time snack. We will use the numbers on the back of each necklace for our random drawing to see who gets to spin the prize wheel at the end of each class. Each lucky spinner is guaranteed a prize!! All prizes are brand new and of awesome quality! The following pictures are of the exact prizes that will be given away. We will also be handing out, by various means, nifty hygiene kits. These kits are great if you forgot to bring something with you to the playa or have run out of something. We are all about keeping our fellow burners happy and healthy!
Link: http://www.schoolofsafesex.org

properties.name: PlayGround Experience
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 2
Address:
Location: 2:00 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: PlayGround is an entertainment entity set up to foster community, adventure and play. We create spaces to explore and reconnect with the inner you. 
Body Pain-Ting: No one ever said making art was easy, which is why we have brought the ultimate body painting experience to the Playa. We'll use plethora of instruments to spank you with finest colours. This puts the Pain into Body Painting. Come as you dare!
Lala's Hugs 'N' Rubs: Weary adventurers, come in for a refreshing mint tea and either a 15 minute rub (massage) or hug. Choose from a menu of 5/6 options of each. Rubs include Eargasm Rub, Playa Head Hold, Shape Shifting Shoulder Rub. Hugs include Playa Sunshine Hug, Uncomfortable English Hug and Kiss and a bunch of others. Don't forget our speciality: the Creepy Hug!
Human Foosball! We are the champions, and we know it! Foosball, Football, Soccer? Whatever you want to call it, roll up with your camp mates, and step on the pitch. We've got your foosball fix, right here! This is tournament standard fun. Sign up for a session with six other camp mates, and we'll add you to our tournament. You could also challenge a fellow camp to try our their football skills - no prisoners will be taken.
Events: Body Pain-Ting:Wednesday, September 2nd, 1–4pm / Thursday, September 3rd, 1–4pm / Friday, September 4th, 1–4pm.
LaLa's Hugs 'N' Rubs Wednesday, September 2nd, 4–6pm Thursday, September 3rd, 4–6pm / Friday, September 4th, 4–6pm. 
Human Foosball Tournament Wednesday, September 2nd, noon–4pm / Thursday, September 3rd, noon–4pm / Friday, September 4th, noon–4pm.
Link: https://www.facebook.com/PlayGroundExperience

properties.name: Shamandome
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 7:00 & Arcade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Shamandome is a collective of "Shamanistas" - people interested in developing the understanding and practice of ancient healing wisdom for the good of others and ourselves. Shamanistas collaborate with Spirit and help you break through negative patterns to create a new reality by re-directing energy. We find joy, community, identity and healing in utilizing the right side of the brain through shamanic journeying, and in helping others do the same.

Our tradition does not use drugs or plant medicines, we use only drumming and rattling for journeying.

Unleash your Power Animal!
Wake up the Shaman in you!

Exercise more of your options in Life, Mind, Body, Spirit, Cosmos and Heart.
Events:
Link: http://www.shamandome.org/

properties.name: Essence
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 4.5
Address:
Location: 4:45 & Geek, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Essence provides BRC residents with beautiful art to experience as they navigate the streets. Computer controlled lamps are hanging in the front of our camp for everyone to see, and illuminate the area. Art will be displayed on the front walls facing the street. Essence also promotes interactivity through the mediation/self-discovery/divination card desk. In the card room in the front of the camp, people can sit down and learn how to use the Essentia Card Deck to understand themselves and other people better in a very interactive way. A deck will be given to burners that would like a copy for themselves, allowing them to interact with other burners and to explore their own inner world.
Events: Daily Card Readings

properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 3
Address:
Location: 2:45 & Illusion, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Fix your broke-ass life! Find love, health, wealth and the keys to your car. One Galactic Redirect letter does it all!. From 11 AM - 1 PM Mon-Fri you can write a letter directly to the Universe to manifest the life you REALLY want. Your letter will circle the globe, enter the ethers and Presto! Your new life and your letter will arrive back to you in 1 or 3 years. It's AMAZING! Guaranteed results or your money back!.
Events: Monday - Friday 11 AM - 1 PM -
Come write a letter to the Universe. We'll have paper, coloring books, glue for sniffing or sticking, stickers and stamps of all kinds.
Visualizing and creative meditations provided!

properties.name: Stars, Hearts, Bunnies, and Tea Camp
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 7:30 & Jolly, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Welcome to Stars, Hearts, Bunnies, and Tea Camp! We are villaged with Do More Now for 2015! Founded in 2012 by Temple Guardians Cuchulainn and Temple Bunny Mag Aoidh to bring traditional Chinese Gongfu Cha (工夫茶) to the Playa! With the aid of a gaiwan we serve only high end imported teas from China, Taiwan, and Japan. Our camp aspires to bring warmth, health, meditation, friendship, and good company to those whom seek the way of tea. You'll find no flavored teas, sachets, or tisanes in this camp. Only the real deal from the Camellia Sinensis in the form of loose leaf oolongs, pu-erhs, whites, greens, and blacks. Come find out what real tea is all about or find your established fix with us!

Events:
Link:

Sector: 4.5
Address:
Location: 5:15 & Hanky Pank, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Court is in session. The juror box is the bar, the judges are camp-mates, and the hilarity ensues. The unofficial aficionados of Dispute Resolution. Come with any Playa problem, serious or not, and we will assist in finding a common ground or solution. Guilty parties and overruled objections will be subject to our wheel of punishment. A place to laugh, learn, and hopefully hug it out!
